title: Spamusement - Monkeys turned into workaholics
body: <p>I don't know if I've ever had a spam with the headline of "Monkeys turned into workaholics" but I still think <a href="http://spamusement.com/view.php?id=232" title="Spamusement - Monkeys turned into workaholics">this is funny</a>. (probably because of its foreshadowment (is that even a word? I haven't finished my coffee yet) of the eventual monkey takeover of our society)</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
